message.raw:
Create an EventManager to be used on a per SimulationRunner basis.

Introduces an Init method to the system api, that allows systems to
get the relevant SDF information from the <plugin> tag.

Introduces ISystemConfigure, an interface for a system to create initial
entities, as well as subscribe to events from the EventManager.
